name: Game Development Sources Angversh
description:
Hey yo, I'm Angversh, a passionate Graphic Designer!


This list of useful sources, books, websites on Game Development & Design is considered an additional part of the larger R&D study "Beyond the Glass Ceiling: Game Development" conducted by Angelina Vershinina.


Follow me on:

  • Instagram ✨
  • VK (Vkontakte) 🎮
  • GitHub 🐱‍💻 (I would appreciate you viewing my README page :)


Leave a comment! I appreciate your feedback! 💗


P.S. THE FILMBOOK IS COMING SOON


With love,

Angversh
